title: Microsoft plans to rent data center capacity in Portugal from Nscale: report (MSFT:NASDAQ)
desc: Microsoft (MSFT) plans to rent data center capacity from Nscale in a new facility in Portugal that will be powered by Nvidia's (NVDA) artificial intelligence chips, according to Bloomberg.
